voiceLines.name: About the Event 11
voiceLines.overwriteName: The Tale of Setsubun: Oni Pagoda Festival 8
voiceLines.subtitle:
Your actions climbing the tower have been documented.
It is nice to be able to review our progress.

voiceLines.name: About the Event 12
voiceLines.overwriteName: The Tale of Setsubun: Oni Pagoda Festival 9
voiceLines.subtitle:
Suitable rewards for battle are necessary.
That is very important.

voiceLines.name: About the Event 13
voiceLines.overwriteName: The Tale of Setsubun: Oni Pagoda Festival 10
voiceLines.subtitle:
Ah, is this what they call an ah-cheeb-ment? 
Pingâ™ª

voiceLines.name: About the Event 14
voiceLines.overwriteName: The Tale of Setsubun: Oni Pagoda Festival 11
voiceLines.subtitle:
Please be diligent in checking this thing called 
in-for-mation. Knowledge is key to victory.

voiceLines.name: About the Event 16
voiceLines.overwriteName: The Tale of Setsubun: Oni Pagoda Festival 12
voiceLines.subtitle:
The oni tower has disappeared entirely.
You have done extremely well.

voiceLines.name: About the Event 17
voiceLines.overwriteName: The Tale of Setsubun: Oni Pagoda Festival 13
voiceLines.subtitle:
Hmmm...
This is so moving, even just as a spectator.

voiceLines.name: About the Event 1
voiceLines.overwriteName: The Tale of Setsubun: Oni Pagoda Festival 1
voiceLines.subtitle:
These hot springs are good for recovering.
I would like all Servants to enjoy themselves. And, of course, you as well, Master.

voiceLines.name: About the Event 2
voiceLines.overwriteName: The Tale of Setsubun: Oni Pagoda Festival 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Shall I wash your back?

voiceLines.name: About the Event 3
voiceLines.overwriteName: The Tale of Setsubun: Oni Pagoda Festival 3
voiceLines.subtitle:
I have prepared this chilled drink known as coffee milk.
I hear that it is wonderful after taking a hot bath.
...I shall have some afterwards, too.

voiceLines.name: About the Event 4
voiceLines.overwriteName: The Tale of Setsubun: Oni Pagoda Festival 4
voiceLines.subtitle:
Soaking in hot water...leisurely closing one's eyes...
How nice...
But please make sure you keep an eye out for the news and announcements.

voiceLines.name: About the Event 5
voiceLines.overwriteName: The Tale of Setsubun: Oni Pagoda Festival 5
voiceLines.subtitle:
Oh, you look tired...
This is a good opportunity for me to massage you! Now, come, do not be bashful!
...I will try to control my strength...

confirmVoiceLines.name: Prolonged Bath Warning 1
confirmVoiceLines.overwriteName: The Tale of Setsubun: Oni Pagoda Festival 14
confirmVoiceLines.subtitle:
I see that one of the Servants has recovered.
They look so fierce!
Now, let us move on to the next battle!

confirmVoiceLines.name: Prolonged Bath Warning 2
confirmVoiceLines.overwriteName: The Tale of Setsubun: Oni Pagoda Festival 15
confirmVoiceLines.subtitle: Grrr. Someone is taking their sweet time in the bath...

confirmVoiceLines.name: Prolonged Bath Warning 3
confirmVoiceLines.overwriteName: The Tale of Setsubun: Oni Pagoda Festival 16
confirmVoiceLines.subtitle: They have been in the hot bath for so long...and I think they have fallen asleep.

voiceLines.name: About the Event 6
voiceLines.overwriteName: The Tale of Setsubun: Oni Pagoda Festival 6
voiceLines.subtitle:
Good work in these recent battles.
This hot spring will still be here for a while, so please take your time and enjoy yourself.

voiceLines.name: About the Event 8
voiceLines.overwriteName: The Tale of Setsubun: Oni Pagoda Festival 7
voiceLines.subtitle: Master. Please make sure you did not forget anything.

voiceLines.name: About the Event 1
voiceLines.overwriteName: The Tale of Setsubun: Oni Pagoda Festival 1
voiceLines.subtitle:
These hot springs are good for recovering.
I would like all Servants to enjoy themselves. And, of course, you as well, Master.

voiceLines.name: About the Event 2
voiceLines.overwriteName: The Tale of Setsubun: Oni Pagoda Festival 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Shall I wash your back?

voiceLines.overwriteName: The Tale of Setsubun: Oni Pagoda Festival 3
voiceLines.subtitle:
I have prepared this chilled drink known as coffee milk.
I hear that it is wonderful after taking a hot bath.
...I shall have some afterwards, too.

voiceLines.name: About the Event 4
voiceLines.overwriteName: The Tale of Setsubun: Oni Pagoda Festival 4
voiceLines.subtitle:
Soaking in hot water...leisurely closing one's eyes...
How nice...
But please make sure you keep an eye out for the news and announcements.

voiceLines.overwriteName: The Tale of Setsubun: Oni Pagoda Festival 5
voiceLines.subtitle:
Oh, you look tired...
This is a good opportunity for me to massage you! Now, come, do not be bashful!
...I will try to control my strength...

voiceLines.name: About the Event 6
voiceLines.overwriteName: The Tale of Setsubun: Oni Pagoda Festival 6
voiceLines.subtitle:
Good work in these recent battles.
This hot spring will still be here for a while, so please take your time and enjoy yourself.

voiceLines.name: About the Event 8
voiceLines.overwriteName: The Tale of Setsubun: Oni Pagoda Festival 7
voiceLines.subtitle: Master. Please make sure you did not forget anything.

voiceLines.name: About the Event 11
voiceLines.overwriteName: The Tale of Setsubun: Oni Pagoda Festival 8
voiceLines.subtitle:
Your actions climbing the tower have been documented.
It is nice to be able to review our progress.

voiceLines.name: About the Event 12
voiceLines.overwriteName: The Tale of Setsubun: Oni Pagoda Festival 9
voiceLines.subtitle:
Suitable rewards for battle are necessary.
That is very important.

voiceLines.name: About the Event 13
voiceLines.overwriteName: The Tale of Setsubun: Oni Pagoda Festival 10
voiceLines.subtitle:
Ah, is this what they call an ah-cheeb-ment? 
Pingâ™ª

voiceLines.name: About the Event 14
voiceLines.overwriteName: The Tale of Setsubun: Oni Pagoda Festival 11
voiceLines.subtitle:
Please be diligent in checking this thing called 
in-for-mation. Knowledge is key to victory.

voiceLines.name: About the Event 16
voiceLines.overwriteName: The Tale of Setsubun: Oni Pagoda Festival 12
voiceLines.subtitle:
The oni tower has disappeared entirely.
You have done extremely well.

voiceLines.name: About the Event 17
voiceLines.overwriteName: The Tale of Setsubun: Oni Pagoda Festival 13
voiceLines.subtitle:
Hmmm...
This is so moving, even just as a spectator.

voiceLines.name: Prolonged Bath Warning 1
voiceLines.overwriteName: The Tale of Setsubun: Oni Pagoda Festival 14
voiceLines.subtitle:
I see that one of the Servants has recovered.
They look so fierce!
Now, let us move on to the next battle!

voiceLines.name: Prolonged Bath Warning 2
voiceLines.overwriteName: The Tale of Setsubun: Oni Pagoda Festival 15
voiceLines.subtitle: Grrr. Someone is taking their sweet time in the bath...

voiceLines.name: Prolonged Bath Warning 3
voiceLines.overwriteName: The Tale of Setsubun: Oni Pagoda Festival 16
voiceLines.subtitle: They have been in the hot bath for so long...and I think they have fallen asleep.

voiceLines.name: Tower Clear 1
voiceLines.overwriteName: The Tale of Setsubun: Oni Pagoda Festival 17
voiceLines.subtitle:
Wonderful.
Now, let's head to the next level!

voiceLines.name: Tower Clear 2
voiceLines.overwriteName: The Tale of Setsubun: Oni Pagoda Festival 18
voiceLines.subtitle:
Floor cleared!
...That's what I'm supposed to say, correct?
Tee hee. I did once play a game with a phrase like that.

voiceLines.name: Tower Clear 4
voiceLines.overwriteName: The Tale of Setsubun: Oni Pagoda Festival 19
voiceLines.subtitle: You have managed to reach the fiftieth floor. Congratulations! Let's climb the second half with just as much spirit! I will of course, accompany you.

voiceLines.name: Tower Clear 5
voiceLines.overwriteName: The Tale of Setsubun: Oni Pagoda Festival 20
voiceLines.subtitle:
We have finally reached and completed the one hundredth floor!
I have nothing but admiration for you.
Master and Servants...you have all done well!

voiceLines.name: Tower Clear 16
voiceLines.overwriteName: The Tale of Setsubun: Oni Pagoda Festival 21
voiceLines.subtitle: Let's buckle down and proceed to the next floor!

voiceLines.name: Tower Clear 17
voiceLines.overwriteName: The Tale of Setsubun: Oni Pagoda Festival 22
voiceLines.subtitle: Master, we cannot let our guard down!

voiceLines.name: Tower Clear 18
voiceLines.overwriteName: The Tale of Setsubun: Oni Pagoda Festival 23
voiceLines.subtitle:
No need to be impatient.
It's especially important to take it one step at a time on treacherous paths.
Let's proceed steadily.

voiceLines.name: Tower Clear 19
voiceLines.overwriteName: The Tale of Setsubun: Oni Pagoda Festival 24
voiceLines.subtitle:
Now, we're halfway there.
This will truly be the path that leads to our FINAL summit.
Of course I shall accompany you!

voiceLines.name: Tower Clear 20
voiceLines.overwriteName: The Tale of Setsubun: Oni Pagoda Festival 25
voiceLines.subtitle:
I am moved beyond words.
You did extremely well.
And thank you very much, Master.
